Package universityProject.dev.academicEntities

Class Lesson

java.lang.Object
universityProject.dev.academicEntities.Lesson
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Lesson extends Object implements Serializable
Version:
18.12.2023 The Lesson class represents an academic lesson within the university. It contains information such as the lesson ID, associated course, topic, and type.
Author:
Asyl
